fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 474.32 lakh crore compared with Rs 218.54 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 rose 13.45 points or 0.08% to settle at 16,985.60. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 0.47% to 16.22. RIL, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
